amendment.description: Amendment to first reduce, then increase, funding for nuclear regulatory commission salaries and expenses by $1 million for the purpose of providing resources for the NRC to ensure safe and effective decommissioning of nuclear power plants.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to first reduce, then increase, funding for nuclear regulatory commission salaries and expenses by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Keating.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Keating amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
